providers.name: Germanna Community College Adult Education & Workforce Programs
providers.description: Adult education, workforce training, and career readiness programs serving the Germanna Community College region.
providers.eligibility: Adults seeking education, workforce skills, credentials, or career advancement within the Germanna service region

providers.name: Madison County Meals on Wheels
providers.description: Delivers meals to eligible homebound residents of Madison County.
providers.eligibility: Homebound residents of Madison County, primarily seniors and adults with disabilities.

providers.name: Madison County Department of Social Services - Child Care Subsidy
providers.description: Local administration of the Virginia Child Care Subsidy Program for eligible families.
providers.eligibility: Residents of Madison County who meet Virginia Child Care Subsidy income and activity requirements.
